title: London, BL, Add. 14704
Digital Catalogue of Syriac Manuscripts in the British Library
Services for the canonical hours of the ferial days (ܢܓܗܐ, ܠܠܝܐ, ܨܦܪܐ), the arrangement of which is ascribed to Jacob of Edessa.
